name: Fried Cucumbers
author: Carmen
summary: My husband isn't crazy about fried green tomatoes, but he loves these. This is a different and easy way to use up all the cucumbers in the garden! They can be dipped in ranch dressing, horseradish sauce, or salsa.
directions: Heat the vegetable oil in a large heavy skillet over medium high heat
Line a plate with a paper towel; set aside
Roll the cucumber slices in the cornmeal
Fry the slices in the hot oil, a few at a time, until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side
Transfer the cucumbers to the prepared plate; sprinkle with salt to serve
